00035  * @package     TYPO3

00037  */
00038 abstract class tx_oop_Session_Data_Base implements ArrayAccess, Iterator
00039 {
00040     /**
00041      * 
00042      */
00043     abstract public static function getInstance( $name );
00044     
00045     /**
00046      * 
00047      */
00048     abstract protected function _getUser();
00049     
00050     /**
00051      * 
00052      */

00056      * 
00057      */
00058     abstract protected function _updateSessionData();

00060     /**
00061      * 
00062      */

00065     /**
00066      * 
00067      */

00091      * 
00092      */
00093     private function __construct( $name )
00094     {
00095         $this->_instanceName = $name;
00096         $this->_user         = $this->_getUser();
00097         $this->_data         = $this->_getSessionData();
00098         
00099         if( !is_array( $this->_data ) ) {
00100             
00101             $this->_data = array();
00102         }
00103     }
00104     
00105     /**
00106      * 
00107      */
00108     public function __toString()
00109     {
00110         return serialize( $this->_data );
00111     }
00112     
00113     /**
00114      * 
00115      */
00116     public function __get( $name )
00117     {
00118         return ( isset( $this->_data[ $name ] ) ) ? $this->_data[ $name ] : false;
00119     }
00120     
00121     /**
00122      * 
00123      */
00124     public function __set( $name, $value )
00125     {
00126         $this->_data[ $name ] = $value;
00127         $this->_updateSessionData();
00128     }
00129     
00130     /**
00131      * 
00132      */

00134     {

00198      *

00200     public function next()
00201     {
00202         next( $this->_data );
00203         $this->_iteratorIndex++;
00204     }
00205     
00206     /**
00207      * 
00208      */
00209     public function valid()
00210     {
00211         return ( $this->_iteratorIndex < count( $this->_data ) ) ? true : false;
00212     }
00213     
00214     /**
00215      * 
00216      */
00217     public function rewind()
00218     {
00219         reset( $this->_data );
00220     }
00221     
00222     /**
00223      * 
00224      */
00225     protected static function _getInstance( $class, $name )
00226     {
00227         if( !isset( self::$_instances[ $name ] ) ) {
00228             
00229             self::$_instances[ $name ] = new $class( $name );
00230             self::$_nbInstances++;
00231         }
00232         
00233         return self::$_instances[ $name ];
00234     }
